title: Buff Lucian's [W]
body:
**Dear Riot**
As we all know Lucian has a pretty rubbish [W]. I had a great idea of buffing his [W] by making it a slow or stun. This would make it more appealing to the League of Legends Community by making him used. Lucian's [W] usually is only good for farming and double shotting, with this change it would be useful in so may ways. If buffing his [W] is to OP, you can nerf the double shot, for example, when you use the [W] you will not get a double shot ability. Without this change Lucian will continue being squishy.

**Sincerely, iKnowWhoYouAm**
*PS. Why did you have not nerf Fizz :'(*

replies.body:
Lucian's W is both utility, a reset and extra damage in one. The damage isn't insane, and the utility he gets from it isn't disgusting. The reset is his passive.

Lucian is fine.

> Lucian's [W] usually is only good for farming and double shotting

I cried.
Ap lucian and you've got something

If this is serious, it's funny.

If it's a joke, it's not funny.

Either way, you're an idiot.

>[W] by making it a slow or stun.


lol get out

Doesn't his W make Lucian do more damage to the people hit by it, that's pretty over powered on its own. His W doesn't need a buff, because he is extremely mobile already and plus the damage you can do after you W is insane. I've seen Lucian's W then get the double shot and do one more auto and the enemy is dead. He doesn't need a buff

Umm, he's meant to have no CC at all...he's supposed to have maximum balanced mobility...


But yeah, the W damage is pretty lame to be honest...
I agree but he really needs a buff on his [W]
